content.text: {"translationLines":[{"lineNumber":116781,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ま、魔人の姿になれば、その……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"W-well, if I take on the form of a demon lord, then...\""},{"lineNumber":116782,"originalJapaneseLine":"　あれくらいなら私一人で運べるので……」","translatedEnglishLine":"I can carry something that size all by myself...\""},{"lineNumber":116783,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ああ、いいじゃないか。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ah, that's fine."},{"lineNumber":116784,"originalJapaneseLine":"　手伝いたいなら手伝ってやればいい」","translatedEnglishLine":"If you want to help, you should just go ahead and help.\""},{"lineNumber":116785,"originalJapaneseLine":"「で、でも、やっぱり迷惑なような……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"B-but, I still feel like it's a bother..."},{"lineNumber":116786,"originalJapaneseLine":"　皆さん、嫌な顔するかも……」","translatedEnglishLine":"Everyone might make unpleasant faces...\""},{"lineNumber":116787,"originalJapaneseLine":"「というか話しかけただけで、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Or rather, just by talking to them,"},{"lineNumber":116788,"originalJapaneseLine":"　きっとみんな顔をしかめて嫌な思いを……」","translatedEnglishLine":"They'll surely frown and feel annoyed...\""},{"lineNumber":116789,"originalJapaneseLine":"「するわけないだろ！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"That's impossible!"},{"lineNumber":116790,"originalJapaneseLine":"　いいから、行ってこい！」","translatedEnglishLine":"Just go already!\""},{"lineNumber":116791,"originalJapaneseLine":"「わわわ……！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"W-w-w...!\""},{"lineNumber":116792,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あ、あのぉ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"U-um...\""},{"lineNumber":116793,"originalJapaneseLine":"「うわっ、でかっ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Whoa, it's huge!\""},{"lineNumber":116794,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ええっ、鬼！？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Eh, a demon!?\""},{"lineNumber":116795,"originalJapaneseLine":"「えと、その……あの……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Uh, well... um...\""},{"lineNumber":116796,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"........\""},{"lineNumber":116797,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ううううう〜〜〜〜……！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Uuuuuuuuuu~...!\""},{"lineNumber":116798,"originalJapaneseLine":"「すみません、なんでもありません！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Sorry, it was nothing!\""},{"lineNumber":116799,"originalJapaneseLine":"「い、行っちまった……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"H-he's gone...\""},{"lineNumber":116800,"originalJapaneseLine":"「なんだった……の、かしら……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"What was that... I wonder...\""},{"lineNumber":116801,"originalJapaneseLine":"「こらー！　逃げ帰ってくるなー！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hey! Don’t run away and come back!\""},{"lineNumber":116802,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ああ、無理、無理です！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ah, no, it's impossible, impossible!"},{"lineNumber":116803,"originalJapaneseLine":"　私にはこれ以上、無理です！」","translatedEnglishLine":"I can't do anymore than this!\""},{"lineNumber":116804,"originalJapaneseLine":"「まったく、でかい図体してる癖に、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Geez, despite having such a big body,"},{"lineNumber":116805,"originalJapaneseLine":"　とんでもない引っ込み思案だな」","translatedEnglishLine":"you're incredibly shy.\""},{"lineNumber":116806,"originalJapaneseLine":"「で、でかい図体は借り物ですから……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"B-big body is borrowed, you know...\""},{"lineNumber":116807,"originalJapaneseLine":"「と、というか、このでかい体、嫌ぁ……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"O-okay, but I hate this big body..."},{"lineNumber":116808,"originalJapaneseLine":"　いっぱい目立つし、見られるし……ぐすっ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"It's way too noticeable and everyone looks at me... sniff...\""},{"lineNumber":116809,"originalJapaneseLine":"ニミッツは体を限界まで小さくして、","translatedEnglishLine":"Nimitz shrunk her body to the limit,"},{"lineNumber":116810,"originalJapaneseLine":"その場に座り込んでいた。","translatedEnglishLine":"and sat down right there."},{"lineNumber":116811,"originalJapaneseLine":"「おや？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Oh?\""},{"lineNumber":116812,"originalJapaneseLine":"「え？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Huh?\""},{"lineNumber":116813,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あのぉ……もし、貴方……？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Um... if you... could it be...?"},{"lineNumber":116814,"originalJapaneseLine":"「もしかして、あの岩……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Are you perhaps... going to help with that rock...?\""},{"lineNumber":116815,"originalJapaneseLine":"　どかすの、手伝って下さるの？」","translatedEnglishLine":"Would you help move it?\""},{"lineNumber":116816,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ぁっ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ah...\""},{"lineNumber":116817,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ほれ、聞かれてるぞ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hey, they’re asking.\""},{"lineNumber":116818,"originalJapaneseLine":"「は、はい！　はい！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Y-yes! Yes!"},{"lineNumber":116819,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ててて、手伝います！」","translatedEnglishLine":"I-I'll help!\""},{"lineNumber":116820,"originalJapaneseLine":"「まぁ〜、それは助かるわぁ〜」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Oh, that really helps~\""},{"lineNumber":116821,"originalJapaneseLine":"半ば、老婆に手を引かれるような形で","translatedEnglishLine":"Half led by the old woman by the hand,"},{"lineNumber":116822,"originalJapaneseLine":"手伝いに行ったニミッツは、","translatedEnglishLine":"Nimitz went to help,"},{"lineNumber":116823,"originalJapaneseLine":"軽々と大岩をどかし町民に大層感謝された。","translatedEnglishLine":"easily moved the large rock and was greatly thanked by the townspeople."},{"lineNumber":116824,"originalJapaneseLine":"「おばあさんにおまんじゅう……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I got some buns from the old lady...\""},{"lineNumber":116825,"originalJapaneseLine":"　貰っちゃいました……」","translatedEnglishLine":"I was given some...\""},{"lineNumber":116826,"originalJapaneseLine":"「おう、お礼だってな。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Oh, that’s a thank you gift."},{"lineNumber":116827,"originalJapaneseLine":"　良かったじゃないか」","translatedEnglishLine":"That's great, isn't it?\""},{"lineNumber":116828,"originalJapaneseLine":"「これは……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"This is...\""},{"lineNumber":116829,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あああ、後で菓子折でも買って、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ahh, maybe I should buy a box of sweets later,"},{"lineNumber":116830,"originalJapaneseLine":"　お返しをした方が良いのでしょうか？","translatedEnglishLine":"to return the favor?\""}]}

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "W-well, if I take on the form of a demon lord, then..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あれくらいなら私一人で運べるので……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I can carry something that size all by myself..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 手伝いたいなら手伝ってやればいい」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If you want to help, you should just go ahead and help."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「で、でも、やっぱり迷惑なような……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "B-but, I still feel like it's a bother...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 皆さん、嫌な顔するかも……」
「というか話しかけただけで、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Or rather, just by talking to them,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: きっとみんな顔をしかめて嫌な思いを……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They'll surely frown and feel annoyed..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「すみません、なんでもありません！」
「こらー！　逃げ帰ってくるなー！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hey! Don’t run away and come back!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 私にはこれ以上、無理です！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I can't do anymore than this!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「まったく、でかい図体してる癖に、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Geez, despite having such a big body,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: とんでもない引っ込み思案だな」
「で、でかい図体は借り物ですから……」
「と、というか、このでかい体、嫌ぁ……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "O-okay, but I hate this big body...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: いっぱい目立つし、見られるし……ぐすっ……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It's way too noticeable and everyone looks at me... sniff..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ニミッツは体を限界まで小さくして、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Nimitz shrunk her body to the limit,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その場に座り込んでいた。

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Are you perhaps... going to help with that rock...?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: どかすの、手伝って下さるの？」
半ば、老婆に手を引かれるような形で
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Half led by the old woman by the hand,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 手伝いに行ったニミッツは、
軽々と大岩をどかし町民に大層感謝された。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: easily moved the large rock and was greatly thanked by the townspeople.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「おばあさんにおまんじゅう……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I got some buns from the old lady..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あああ、後で菓子折でも買って、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ahh, maybe I should buy a box of sweets later,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: お返しをした方が良いのでしょうか？

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Or rather, just by talking to them,

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They'll surely frown and feel annoyed..."

「こらー！　逃げ帰ってくるなー！」

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Geez, despite having such a big body,

「と、というか、このでかい体、嫌ぁ……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "O-okay, but I hate this big body...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その場に座り込んでいた。

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 手伝いに行ったニミッツは、
軽々と大岩をどかし町民に大層感謝された。

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あああ、後で菓子折でも買って、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ahh, maybe I should buy a box of sweets later,
